body: Avicus is truly a great place with nice players, the best of the best maps, and experiences.  What has been your favorite Avicus moment and why?
body_tagged: Avicus is truly a great place with nice players, the best of the best maps, and experiences.  What has been your favorite Avicus moment and why?
title: What is your favorite Avicus moment?

replies.body: One of my best gameplay moments was when I was in a HG back in MCZone, and some guy had built a skybase. Myself and this guy were the only ones left and I had 1 egg in my inventory. I waited until he was on the edge, and I threw my egg and knocked him off to win :p. Also, making a bunch of awesome friends over time on the server :D
replies.body_tagged: One of my best gameplay moments was when I was in a HG back in MCZone, and some guy had built a skybase. Myself and this guy were the only ones left and I had 1 egg in my inventory. I waited until he was on the edge, and I threw my egg and knocked him off to win :p. Also, making a bunch of awesome friends over time on the server :D

replies.body:
Meeting and killing my first mod in McZone. I killed him in an HG game because he ran away like a newb. 





It was izjust4fun
replies.body_tagged:
Meeting and killing my first mod in McZone. I killed him in an HG game because he ran away like a newb.

replies.body:
Probably the best moments of my Avicus career have come from TeamSpeak <3

(There are too many to choose just one)
replies.body_tagged:
Probably the best moments of my Avicus career have come from TeamSpeak <3

(There are too many to choose just one)

replies.body:
Participating in the Mc-Zone Nebula Tournament
Playing with Creepers on CTH - Magma
Playing with Zombie Pigmen - Zalidor
Riding Pigs connected to Leads while having an Invisible Staff Member fly us towards the enemies (also Riding Pigs) - Zalidor
Glitching out of the world with sfkwww (old minecart glitch that tore up my KDR) -Ternio
Building Country Clubs with my friends - Frostbite
Playing on my First Map in Nebula - Castle Adventure
Playing the Same Survival Games Map on Mc-Zone, it was always voted, 99.99% of the time xD - Minecraft - Survival Games 4
Playing Capture the Wool - Rendezvous 2
Using 80 Grenades back on the Old Avicus - Quintus (xD)
Buying TnT Time Bombs in the Shop and Crafting TnT Minecarts, Then Carpet bombing the Enemy team (and killed Tel xD) - Luar
Watching Killerbye Spectating a Hacker by Throwing Damage Potions consistently on the cheating player (lol) - Rendezvous
Making OP Defenses with my Tourney Team Friendz/Members - Any Scrimmage Map/Any Avicus Map
Buying Smoke Bows, Sticky Bows and Invis Effect for 10 seconds on Mc-Zone - Any Map
1v1ing FightToWin on CTH in our own Private Game - Necro
Skybridging, placing water, then riding boats from our castle all the way to the Rainbow in the middle and making it safe with an airborne boat! with the TeamSpeak Crew/Senior Staff - Castle Adventure
Killing players with my Apex buds while we have Strength II - Quintus and Venomous CTM - Old Avicus
Granted a Notch Apple and using it in a Kill-Farm - Quintus - Old Avicus
replies.body_tagged:
Participating in the Mc-Zone Nebula Tournament
Playing with Creepers on CTH - Magma
Playing with Zombie Pigmen - Zalidor

Playing on my First Map in Nebula - Castle Adventure
Playing the Same Survival Games Map on Mc-Zone, it was always voted, 99.99% of the time xD - Minecraft - Survival Games 4
Playing Capture the Wool - Rendezvous 2
Using 80 Grenades back on the Old Avicus - Quintus (xD)
Buying TnT Time Bombs in the Shop and Crafting TnT Minecarts, Then Carpet bombing the Enemy team (and killed Tel xD) - Luar
Watching Killerbye Spectating a Hacker by Throwing Damage Potions consistently on the cheating player (lol) - Rendezvous
Making OP Defenses with my Tourney Team Friendz/Members - Any Scrimmage Map/Any Avicus Map
Buying Smoke Bows, Sticky Bows and Invis Effect for 10 seconds on Mc-Zone - Any Map
1v1ing FightToWin on CTH in our own Private Game - Necro
Skybridging, placing water, then riding boats from our castle all the way to the Rainbow in the middle and making it safe with an airborne boat! with the TeamSpeak Crew/Senior Staff - Castle Adventure
Killing players with my Apex buds while we have Strength II - Quintus and Venomous CTM - Old Avicus
Granted a Notch Apple and using it in a Kill-Farm - Quintus - Old Avicus

replies.body:
My favourite part of Avicus is TeamSpeak.

If you guys don't go on TeamSpeak, I encourage you to do so more often, because you meet really great people and have a great time doing so!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: It's amazing how little negativity there is surrounding avicus. Every other server I've been on has had so much crap going on, but avicus is a really great community.
